author: wn.com
title: Want to Study in France this Summer? LAVC to Offer a Summer 2016 Study in ...
text: ( Source : Los Angeles Valley College ) Want to study in Paris this Summer ? Want to earn up to 8 units of credit? LAVC is offering a Study Away Program to Paris, France in Summer 2016. Come learn more about this month-long study abroad program
